lead_paragraph: With one big block, Dario Saric gave a glimpse of what the 76ers can't wait to see in Philadelphia.

headline.print_headline: Saric's Rio Moment: Swats Away Gasol's Shot to Preserve Win
headline.main: Saric's Rio Moment: Swats Away Gasol's Shot to Preserve Win

snippet: With one big block, Dario Saric gave a glimpse of what the 76ers can't wait to see in Philadelphia....
